name: Butter Crab
desc: A grilled crab dish. Appropriate heat control has allowed the crab meat to stay moist and fatty. The butter has seeped into the crab meat, producing an aroma that has people salivating even from afar.

customize.name: Recipe: Butter Crab
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Butter Crab.

customize.name: Butter
customize.desc: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.

customize.name: Crab
customize.desc: A shelled creature that lives near the ocean. Its flaky, delicious meat can easily be made into tasty dishes.

customize.name: Seagrass
customize.desc: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

customize.name: Matsutake
customize.desc: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

customize.name: Delicious Butter Crab
customize.desc: A grilled crab dish. The butter-infused crab legs have a rich aroma that washes over the tastes buds so seductively that before you know it, you've eaten it all, and are left sipping at the dregs of butter in the crab's shell, hoping to recapture a fragment of the dish's beauty.

customize.name: Suspicious Butter Crab
customize.desc: A grilled crab dish. The crab legs are still cold, and have a raw, salty flavor to them, almost as if one were being force-fed some seawater.

value.text: Increases all party members' DEF by 261 and healing effects by 8% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

value.name: Butter Crab
value.desc:
Butter Crab

The butter-infused crab legs have a rich aroma that washes over the taste buds so seductively that none can resist its allure.

"Another helping, please!"
